text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar President Trump, there's so much more that you know to be true that you are not telling us.  How about the fact that COVID-19 originated at Ft. Detrick, Md? Is that true? We know that COVID-19 did not originate in China.  It originated in the USA.
